column4: Hello.  New to Ubuntu, somewhat new to linux.  Just installed breezy and now trying to get updates and upgrade kernel (using synaptic).  I keep getting warning messages that the files cannot be found on the server.  I checked manually and they aren't there [us.archive.ubuntu.com] .  Anyone konw how to point the software to another repository?
probably best to save updating for another day
what .deb package and where did you get it from?
is is the wxmaxima front end to maxima.  not on any repo I have seen...
